# Kiwiblinds
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Author: Joke De Winter

Version: v1

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Front-end design and code for Kiwi Blinds & Curtains

View site: https://jokedewinter.github.io/kiwiblinds/

View patterns: https://jokedewinter.github.io/kiwiblinds/patterns/index.html
